Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Custom
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Custom (pending)
Important Commands: consent
Different people play games in different ways. We hope one day to have a wide variety of customization features available within Skotos games and Theatres.
However, the only customization currently available relates to the consent system. You can choose whether to always deny someone consent or always allow it. To always allow someone consent, type $(udat.chatchar)CONSENT ALLOW [NAME]. To deny someone consent, type $(udat.chatchar)CONSENT DENY [NAME]. To see your current consent list, type $(udat.chatchar)CONSENT LIST.
See Also: Consent, Friends
